attributes.action: Allow the electorate to vote on issues online
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we truly believe in a democracy, then we should be able to vote on issues online. Those without internet access can use postal votes or at local councils or libraries.

rejection.details:
There is already a very similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/moresay/
If you wish for your own petition to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
